title: Ticket #3103: add _tr1 && >> wrapper elements where possible for codebase update.
description:
The following exists in tr1 which is the base level of operation and >> now: 

<array>
<cmath>
<complex>
<functional> - done
<memory> - done
<random>
<regex>
<tuple>
<type_traits>
<unordered_map> - done
<unordered_set>
<utility>
